item.title: Fix the Git completion with Oh-my-Zsh on Mac
item.description: In a previous post, I have explained how I have setup oh-my-zsh with the git plugin. I am also using homebrew to manage the packages installed on my Mac. After upgrading Git recently, I have noticed the Git completion was not as powerful anymore.
